channel.title: Comments on: Thanks, LessThanDot
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.description: I would also like to thank my fellow comrades. Thank you for making it possible for me to finally take over the world...from my PC
item.content:encoded: I would also like to thank my fellow comrades. Thank you for making it possible for me to finally take over the world…from my PC

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: I add my kudos. This is not just a great technical resource, but also a great place to meet new friends and forge professional relationships.
item.content:encoded: I add my kudos. This is not just a great technical resource, but also a great place to meet new friends and forge professional relationships.

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: I'd like to say thank you to LTD as well. Without this site I wouldn't be at my current skill level as far as SQL Server is concerned.
item.content:encoded: I’d like to say thank you to LTD as well. Without this site I wouldn’t be at my current skill level as far as SQL Server is concerned.

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: Yeah, yeah now go back to work.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, yeah now go back to work.

item.title: By: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.dc:creator: Naomi Nosonovsky
item.description: I appreciate the opportunity to blog. Doubtfully I would have ever started blogging if not for LTD. I also learned quite a log from the blogs.
item.content:encoded: I appreciate the opportunity to blog. Doubtfully I would have ever started blogging if not for LTD. I also learned quite a log from the blogs.
